label: documentTypeCode
comment: A code specifying a type of acknowledgement document.
The code specifying the document type for this XHE payload instance.
The code specifying the type of exchanged document.
The code specifying the type of referenced document.
The code specifying the type of this exchanged declaration.

rangeIncludes.comment: A character string denoting the type of a document. [Reference United Nations Code List (UNCL) 1001]

domainIncludes.comment: A document exchanged between parties for a business application level acknowledgement of the receipt of information.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that is exchanged between two parties as a formal declaration.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that is exchanged between two or more parties.
An individual set of transmitted data in an XHE (Exchange Header Envelope).
